World of Aenea Transparent Unabtrusive GUI Overhaul/Upgrade by The Amethyst Dragon

This is an upgraded, unabtrusive, informative, and transparent GUI for Neverwinter Nights. It was designed so that the game interface would not intrude as much on play of the game.

Featured in this upgrade are:
  • An informative hit point bar (that tells you at a glace how wounded you are)[/*:m]
  • Transparent chat bar, chat windows, and quickbar[/*:m]
  • Transparent windows for everything in the game, from character sheet to journal[/*:m]
  • Transparent player menu buttons[/*:m]
  • Upgraded versions of all my Hall of Fame winning Colorized Icons[/*:m]
  • Upgraded emote icons[/*:m]
  • Colorized domain icons[/*:m]
  • All in-game icons (not cursors, just icons) have been upgraded to blend in [/*:m]
[/list]



******************************


The transparent GUI by The Amethyst dragon is simply awesome. The folks at BW should have released the game with these kind of looks and luckily for us someone else developed this amazing GUI. Once you add it to your override you won't get it out of it anymore.




******************************


Complete GUI Alterations Package (Transparent and Colorized) by The Amethyst Dragon

Added at the suggestion of several people, this is a combination of all of my GUI alterations (up to December 1, 2009) as a single download.

Included are all of my Hall of Fame alterations.
Spell Icons: Colorized
Feat & Ability Icons: Colorized
Class Icons: Colorized
Radial Icons: Colorized
Emote Icons for 1.69
1.69 Icons: Colorized
Transparent GUI

Also included are my Dungeon Master Icons: Colorized



******************************


And here we have another piece of art. NWN is never gonna look the same again.
